entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 10:00 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
Temperature: -8.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: N 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
